item.title: Canning Wort
item.author: jarret.lavallee@gmail.com (jarret)
item.description: One of the most aggravating things about making a starter is that you have to boil the wort to sanitize. I would throw some DME, yeast nutrient and water into the clean flask. You then boil the wort in the flask and flash chill it. The whole process takes a while and if done one at a time is too much work. I recently bought a pressure cooker and it has made my life SO much easier.
